name: koito
description: Koito is a self hosted media and watch list tracker for anime and shows. It integrates with external databases, keeps track of episodes watched and organizes series, offering a simple interface for managing your watch progress.
features: Watch Tracking: Track anime and TV show viewing progress episode by episode. Never lose your place.
Episode Management: Mark episodes as watched and track completion status. Monitor viewing progress.
Series Organization: Organize shows into watching, completed, and plan-to-watch lists. Structure your viewing queue.
Database Integration: Fetch metadata, cover art, and information from external databases. Rich series details automatically.
Automatic Updates: Get notified when new episodes are released for tracked series. Stay current with shows.
Search & Discovery: Find new anime and shows to watch with search functionality. Discover content easily.
Rating System: Rate series and episodes to remember your favorites. Track what you enjoyed.
Statistics: View watching statistics, time spent, and completion rates. Understand your viewing habits.
Calendar View: See upcoming episode releases in calendar format. Plan your watching schedule.
Import & Export: Backup your watch history and migrate between services. Portable viewing data.
Mobile Friendly: Responsive interface for tracking on smartphones and tablets. Update progress anywhere.
Custom Lists: Create custom lists for genres, themes, or personal organization. Organize beyond standard categories.
